flavorText: Dromoka rules her clan from the Great Aerie atop Arashin, the central city of the Shifting Wastes.

foreignData.flavorText: Dromoka regiert ihren Klan vom Großen Drachenhorst hoch über Arashin aus, der zentralen Stadt der Wandelnden Wüsten.
foreignData.name: Denkmal der Dromoka
foreignData.text:
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {G} oder {W}.
{4}{G}{W}: Das Denkmal der Dromoka wird bis zum Ende des Zuges zu einer 4/4 grünen und weißen Drache-Artefaktkreatur mit Flugfähigkeit.

foreignData.flavorText: Drómoka controla a su clan desde el Gran Nido en lo más alto de Arashin, la ciudad en el centro de los Yermos Cambiantes.
foreignData.name: Monumento a Drómoka
foreignData.text:
{T}: Agrega {G} o {W} a tu reserva de maná.
{4}{G}{W}: El Monumento a Drómoka se convierte en una criatura artefacto Dragón verde y blanca 4/4 con la habilidad de volar hasta el final del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Dromoka règne sur son clan depuis le Grand aérain qui surplombe Arashin, la cité au cœur des Landes changeantes.
foreignData.name: Monument de Dromoka
foreignData.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {G} ou {W} à votre réserve.
{4}{G}{W} : Le Monument de Dromoka devient une créature-artefact 4/4 verte et blanche Dragon avec le vol jusqu'à la fin du tour.

foreignData.flavorText: Dromoka regna sul suo clan dal Grande Nido alla sommità di Arashin, la città centrale delle Distese Cangianti.
foreignData.name: Monumento a Dromoka
foreignData.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {G} o {W} alla tua riserva di mana.
{4}{G}{W}: Il Monumento a Dromoka diventa una creatura artefatto Drago 4/4 verde e bianca con volare fino alla fine del turno.

foreignData.flavorText: 変容する荒野の中心都市であるアラシンの上層に位置する大いなる高楼から、ドロモカは自らの氏族を統治している。
foreignData.name: ドロモカの碑
foreignData.text:
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{G}か{W}を加える。
{4}{G}{W}：ターン終了時まで、ドロモカの碑は飛行を持つ緑であり白である４/４のドラゴン・アーティファクト・クリーチャーになる。

foreignData.flavorText: 드로모카는 변화하는 황무지의 중심 도시인 아라신 꼭대기에 있는 위대한 둥지에서 자신의 부족을 다스린다.
foreignData.name: 드로모카 기념비
foreignData.text:
{T}: {G} 또는 {W}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
{4}{G}{W}: 드로모카 기념비는 턴종료까지 비행을 가진 녹색이며 백색인 4/4 용 마법물체 생물이 된다.

foreignData.flavorText: Dromoka governa seu clã do Grande Ninho, no topo de Arashin, cidade central dos Ermos Mutáveis.
foreignData.name: Monumento a Dromoka
foreignData.text:
{T}: Adicione {G} ou {W} à sua reserva de mana.
{4}{G}{W}: Monumento a Dromoka torna-se uma criatura artefato verde e branca 4/4 do tipo Dragão com voar até o final do turno.

foreignData.flavorText: Дромока правит своим кланом из Великого Гнездовья над Арашином, центральным городом Бродячих Пустошей.
foreignData.name: Монумент Дромоки
foreignData.text:
{T}: добавьте {G} или {W} в ваше хранилище маны.
{4}{G}{W}: Монумент Дромоки становится артефактом существом 4/4 зеленый и белый Дракон с Полетом до конца хода.

foreignData.flavorText: 卓茉卡居于阿拉辛高处的王龙巢中，在变幻荒漠的中心统治部落。

foreignData.text:

{4}{G}{W}：直到回合结束，卓茉卡纪念碑成为4/4，绿白双色，具飞行异能的龙神器生物。

foreignData.flavorText: 卓茉卡居於阿拉辛高處的王龍巢中，在變幻荒漠的中心統治部落。
foreignData.name: 卓茉卡紀念碑
foreignData.text:
{T}：加{G}或{W}到你的魔法力池中。
{4}{G}{W}：直到回合結束，卓茉卡紀念碑成為4/4，綠白雙色，具飛行異能的龍神器生物。

name: Dromoka Monument
originalText:
{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
{4}{G}{W}: Dromoka Monument becomes a 4/4 green and white Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

rulings.text: A Monument can’t attack on the turn it enters the battlefield.
Each Monument is colorless, although the last ability will make each of them two colors until end of turn.

If a Monument has any +1/+1 counters on it, those counters will remain on the permanent after it stops being a creature. Those counters will have no effect as long as the Monument isn’t a creature, but they will apply again if the Monument later becomes a creature.

Activating the last ability of a Monument while it’s already a creature will override any effects that set its power or toughness to a specific value. Effects that modify power or toughness without directly setting them to a specific value will continue to apply.

text:
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
{4}{G}{W}: Dromoka Monument becomes a 4/4 green and white Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.
